Method Detail

constructQuery

public org.apache.lucene.search.Query constructQuery(org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharArraySet querySet)
Method constructQuery Constructs a query out of a Set of Strings. Converts every term of the set (which may consist of multiple words separated with whitespaces) in a phrase query. All phrase queries are joined with 'OR'. There are no special weightings done.

constructQuery

public org.apache.lucene.search.Query constructQuery(java.lang.String query,
                                                     Language language)
Method constructQuery Constructs a query out of a String. Uses the Lucene QueryParser, see Lucene documentation for syntax.

Method searchDocuments Searches for documents matching the query and returns them.
